1.text: Find an object with blunt ends.

2.text: Place the bottle on the floor or a steady surface.

3.text: Set your object against the cork.

4.vid: /7/7d/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 4 Version 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Find a pocket knife or a paring knife.

6.text: Insert the blade into the cork.

7.text: Twist back and forth to slowly remove the cork.
7.vid: /c/c0/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.text: Wedge the knife in between the bottle and the cork.
8.vid: /f/fe/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Remove the wine bottle's protective cover.

10.text: Place the bottle of wine in the opening of your shoe.

11.text: Hit the sole of your shoe holding the wine bottle gently against a wall.
11.vid: /a/ac/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

12.vid: /8/8c/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 12 Version 4.360p.mp4

14.text: Twist the screw into the cork.
14.vid: /f/f4/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 14 Version 4.360p.mp4

15.text: Pull on the screw with pliers.
15.vid: /e/e2/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 15 Version 4.360p.mp4

16.text: Remove the screw with a corncob holder.

17.text: Use a bicycle hook instead of a screw.
17.vid: /6/64/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 17 Version 4.360p.mp4

18.text: Straighten the hook of a wire hanger.

19.text: Make a mini hook at the bottom of the hanger.
19.vid: /5/53/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 19 Version 4.360p.mp4

20.text: Wedge the wire in between the cork and the wine bottle.
20.vid: /5/57/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 20 Version 4.360p.mp4

23.text: Use the hanger as a corkscrew.

24.text: Get two paperclips and a pen.

25.text: Insert one of the paperclips in the side of the bottle.

26.text: Join the ends of the paperclips together.

28.text: Find 3 short finishing nails and a hammer.

29.text: Gently hammer the nails into the cork.
29.vid: /a/aa/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 29 Version 3.360p.mp4

30.text: Place the claw of the hammer around the nails.

31.text: Pry the nail-embedded cork out of the bottle.
31.vid: /5/56/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 31 Version 3.360p.mp4

33.text: Open the scissors all the way.

34.text: Insert the thinner blade into the middle of the cork.

35.text: Twist the scissor handles while pulling up.
35.vid: /1/18/Open a Wine Bottle Without a Corkscrew Step 35 Version 3.360p.mp4
